point I found a redoubt considerably advanced in a position well calculated for defence .

column4: and thus break the ranks of the enemy on their advance .

column3: On the afternoon of the 6th ' we very plainly saw the enemy in motion in the town : dense columns of troops moving down the main street to the wharf and embarking on board the ships which moved down the harbor and formed in a kind of crescent at considerable distance from the hill .
190 AMERICAN THEATRE most of the next day was spent by those ships in beating up nearer to our post - the wind being a head : we continued our work incessantly in compleating the redoubt
